dc_description_s: Relief is shown in hachures.; Plate 67 probably from: Edinburgh geographical and historical atlas : comprehending a sketch of the history of geography; a view of the principles of mathematical, physical, civil, and political geography; an account of the geography, statistics, and history of each continent, state and kingdom, delineated ... / D. Lizars. Edinburgh : John Hamilton, successor to D. Lizars, [1831?].|38.2 x 47.4 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,700,000|General Map Collection
